collection_traits.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // collection_traits.hpp:
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 // License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 // http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See http://www.boost.org for updates, documentation, and revision history.
00018 
00019 // This header assigns a level implemenation trait to a collection type
00020 // for all primitives.  It is needed so that archives which are meant to be
00021 // portable don't write class information in the archive.  Since, not all
00022 // compiles recognize the same set of primitive types, the possibility
00023 // exists for archives to be non-portable if class information for primitive
00024 // types is included.  This is addressed by the following macros.
00025 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/mpl/integral_c.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/mpl/integral_c_tag.hpp>
00028 
00029 #include <boost/cstdint.hpp>
00030 #include <climits> // ULONG_MAX
00031 #include <boost/serialization/level.hpp>
00032 
00033 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(T, C)          \
00034 template<>                                                          \
00035 struct implementation_level< C < T > > {                            \
00036     typedef mpl::integral_c_tag tag;                                \
00037     typedef mpl::int_<object_serializable> type;                    \
00038     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, value = object_serializable);        \
00039 };                                                                  \
00040 
00041 
00042 #if defined(BOOST_NO_CWCHAR) || defined(BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_WCHAR_T)
00043     #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER_WCHAR(C)
00044 #else
00045     #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER_WCHAR(C)   \
00046     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(wchar_t, C)        \
00047     
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 // determine if its necessary to handle (u)int64_t specifically
00051 // i.e. that its not a synonym for (unsigned) long
00052 // if there is no 64 bit int or if its the same as a long
00053 // we shouldn't define separate functions for int64 data types.
00054 #if defined(BOOST_NO_INT64_T)  
00055      #define BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_INT64_T  
00056 #else   
00057     #if defined(ULLONG_MAX)  
00058         #if(ULONG_MAX == 18446744073709551615ul) // 2**64 - 1  
00059             #define BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_INT64_T  
00060         #endif  
00061     #elif defined(ULONG_MAX)  
00062         #if(ULONG_MAX != 0xffffffff && ULONG_MAX == 18446744073709551615ul) // 2**64 - 1  
00063             #define BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_INT64_T  
00064         #endif  
00065     #else   
00066         #define BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_INT64_T  
00067     #endif  
00068 #endif  
00069 
00070 #if !defined(BOOST_NO_INTRINSIC_INT64_T)
00071     #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER_INT64(C)    \
00072     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(boost::int64_t, C)  \
00073     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(boost::uint64_t, C) \
00074     
00075 #else
00076     #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER_INT64(C)
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 #define BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS(C)                     \
00080     namespace boost { namespace serialization {                      \
00081     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(bool, C)            \
00082     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(char, C)            \
00083     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(signed char, C)     \
00084     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(unsigned char, C)   \
00085     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(signed int, C)      \
00086     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(unsigned int, C)    \
00087     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(signed long, C)     \
00088     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(unsigned long, C)   \
00089     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(float, C)           \
00090     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(double, C)          \
00091     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(unsigned short, C)  \
00092     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER(signed short, C)    \
00093     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER_INT64(C)            \
00094     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS_HELPER_WCHAR(C)            \
00095     } }                                                              \
00096     
00097 
00098 #endif // BOOST_SERIALIZATION_COLLECTION_TRAITS
